UniprotID	Q14032
Accession	Q14032;Q3B7W9;Q96L31
EntryName	BAAT_HUMAN
ProteinName	Bile acid-CoA:amino acid N-acyltransferase (BACAT) (BAT) (EC 2.3.1.65) (Bile acid-CoA thioesterase) (Choloyl-CoA hydrolase) (EC 3.1.2.27) (Glycine N-choloyltransferase) (Long-chain fatty-acyl-CoA hydrolase) (EC 3.1.2.2)
GeneName	BAAT
Length	418
Function	Catalyzes the amidation of bile acids (BAs) with the amino acids taurine and glycine (PubMed:12239217, PubMed:12810727, PubMed:2037576, PubMed:8034703). More than 95% of the BAs are N-acyl amidates with glycine and taurine (PubMed:8034703). Amidation of BAs in the liver with glycine or taurine prior to their excretion into bile is an important biochemical event in bile acid metabolism (PubMed:12810727). This conjugation (or amidation) plays several important biological roles in that it promotes the secretion of BAs and cholesterol into bile and increases the detergent properties of BAs in the intestine, which facilitates lipid and vitamin absorption (PubMed:12810727). May also act as an acyl-CoA thioesterase that regulates intracellular levels of free fatty acids (PubMed:12239217, PubMed:12810727, PubMed:8034703). In vitro, catalyzes the hydrolysis of long- and very long-chain saturated acyl-CoAs to the free fatty acid and coenzyme A (CoASH), and conjugates glycine to these acyl-CoAs (PubMed:12810727).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol; Peroxisome
Disorder	0.1969,0.1162,0.0780,0.1206,0.1731,0.2470,0.1914,0.2193,0.1501,0.1759,0.1702,0.2193,0.3117,0.2129,0.2064,0.2292,0.1476,0.1501,0.0985,0.0985,0.0985,0.0568,0.1007,0.1275,0.1184,0.0618,0.0568,0.0967,0.1070,0.1942,0.1942,0.2364,0.1881,0.1007,0.0929,0.1554,0.1399,0.2164,0.2094,0.1643,0.2292,0.1969,0.3321,0.3392,0.2541,0.2541,0.3566,0.2680,0.2680,0.1702,0.1671,0.1702,0.1349,0.1671,0.2783,0.2849,0.2884,0.2783,0.3215,0.2193,0.2715,0.2752,0.2328,0.2164,0.2328,0.3053,0.3053,0.2002,0.1611,0.0780,0.1298,0.0690,0.0676,0.1007,0.1137,0.1137,0.1115,0.0631,0.0676,0.0618,0.0646,0.0473,0.0473,0.0749,0.0817,0.0405,0.0405,0.0443,0.0780,0.1791,0.1702,0.1823,0.1969,0.2129,0.1251,0.1137,0.0676,0.0646,0.1184,0.0662,0.0734,0.0749,0.0719,0.0463,0.0506,0.0518,0.0835,0.0704,0.0506,0.0506,0.0327,0.0888,0.0799,0.1028,0.0929,0.0835,0.0888,0.0888,0.1671,0.1554,0.1349,0.0704,0.0780,0.1137,0.1914,0.1759,0.1115,0.1206,0.1731,0.1229,0.1229,0.0985,0.0799,0.0909,0.1092,0.1115,0.1092,0.1028,0.1643,0.1229,0.0719,0.0690,0.0704,0.1298,0.1791,0.1528,0.1671,0.2292,0.1399,0.0690,0.1476,0.1476,0.1476,0.0799,0.0765,0.0424,0.0202,0.0349,0.0349,0.0198,0.0244,0.0424,0.0506,0.0494,0.0443,0.0178,0.0178,0.0136,0.0136,0.0136,0.0160,0.0115,0.0115,0.0171,0.0306,0.0146,0.0198,0.0405,0.0235,0.0194,0.0198,0.0163,0.0104,0.0165,0.0306,0.0163,0.0372,0.0398,0.0275,0.0341,0.0618,0.1048,0.1528,0.1702,0.1092,0.1162,0.2292,0.1791,0.1969,0.1942,0.1251,0.2193,0.2752,0.3321,0.2918,0.2918,0.2715,0.1671,0.0948,0.1611,0.1399,0.1643,0.1611,0.0870,0.0349,0.0581,0.0531,0.0483,0.0531,0.0463,0.0518,0.0676,0.0592,0.0313,0.0248,0.0327,0.0300,0.0389,0.0734,0.0690,0.0676,0.0372,0.0300,0.0235,0.0306,0.0356,0.0202,0.0127,0.0125,0.0198,0.0133,0.0209,0.0269,0.0294,0.0294,0.0263,0.0148,0.0163,0.0244,0.0244,0.0506,0.0244,0.0531,0.0258,0.0334,0.0231,0.0518,0.0985,0.1115,0.0646,0.0631,0.1028,0.1007,0.0690,0.0676,0.1115,0.2064,0.2164,0.2292,0.2328,0.2224,0.1791,0.3019,0.1852,0.2094,0.2064,0.3117,0.2951,0.2541,0.2436,0.3356,0.2470,0.1702,0.1823,0.1
